Package com.flipkart.dao

Interface UserDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserDAOImpl
public interface UserDAO
This interface defines the methods for User Operations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    createUser(User user)
    Creates a new user in the system.
    User
    getUser(int userId)
    Retrieves the user details.
    RoleType
    getUserRole(int userId)
    Retrieves the role of a user.
    boolean
    updatePassword(String userName, String newPassword)
    Updates the password of a user.
    int
    verifyUser(String username, String password)
    Verifies the user credentials.

  • Method Details

    • createUser

      int createUser(User user)
      Creates a new user in the system.
      Parameters:
      user - The user object containing the details of the user to be created.
      Returns:
      The user ID of the newly created user.

    • verifyUser

      int verifyUser(String username, String password) throws InvalidCredentialsException, UserNotFoundException
      Verifies the user credentials.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user.
      password - The password of the user.
      Returns:
      The user ID if the credentials are valid.
      Throws:
      InvalidCredentialsException - If the credentials are invalid.
      UserNotFoundException - If the user is not found.

    • updatePassword

      boolean updatePassword(String userName, String newPassword)
      Updates the password of a user.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username of the user.
      newPassword - The new password to be set.
      Returns:
      true if the password is updated successfully, false otherwise.

    • getUserRole

      RoleType getUserRole(int userId)
      Retrieves the role of a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The user ID.
      Returns:
      The role type of the user.

    • getUser

      User getUser(int userId)
      Retrieves the user details.
      Parameters:
      userId - The user ID.
      Returns:
      The user object containing the details of the user.
